workflows.name: self-expand.yml
workflows.content:
name: Self Expand

on:
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  expand:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Create placeholder file
        run: echo "Self-expand executed at $(date)" >> system-log.txt
      - name: Commit changes
        run: |
          git config --global user.email 'system@auto'
          git config --global user.name 'Autonomous System'
          git add system-log.txt
          git commit -m 'Self expand update' || echo 'No changes'
          git push

workflows.name: ai-agent.yml
workflows.content:
name: Autonomous AI Agent

on:
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  agent:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Run AI agent
        run: |
          python3 agent/agent.py

      - name: Commit agent output
        run: |
          git config --global user.email 'system@auto'
          git config --global user.name 'Autonomous System'
          git add .
          git commit -m 'AI agent update' || echo 'No changes'
          git push
